name: Asteroids destroy the City Simulator 2017
description:
Asteroids destroy the City Simulator 2017

is an arcade game where you have to protect a city from asteroids. Click with the mouse on the asteroids to destroy them. They are different types of asteroids with unique patterns to destroy them.

This Game was my contribution to the Game++ Community Challenge 11. This was a game jam from the german YouTuber LetsGameDev. The topic of this jam was fall.

Features

  • 5 different asteroid types
  • 2 super asteroids
  • 8 level
  • special ability: shield
  • endless mode
  • local high scores
